title: Quazi Azher Aliâ€™s death anniversary today
body: Today is the 16th death anniversary of Quazi Azher Ali, an educationist, former vice-chancellor of Bangladesh University and founder of Mohammadpur Preparatory School and College, said a press release. On the occasion, a milad and doa mahfil will be held, and food will be distributed among orphans. In addition, a Qurankhwani and doa mahfil will be arranged at the university. Quazi Azher Ali joined the then Pakistan Civil Service in 1959. He earned his PhD from Cambridge University and served in various capacities, including sub-divisional officer, additional deputy commissioner, deputy commissioner and secretary in different ministries.
